title: Shocking moment passenger is kicked off jet at Chicago airport for ‘asking Middle Eastern man if he’d smuggled bomb on board’
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments A PASSENGER on a United Airlines flight from Chicago to Houston was kicked off the plane after allegedly asking a man of “Middle Eastern appearance” if he had a bomb in his bag. 
The incident, which took place yesterday just before take-off, was captured on camera by a fellow passenger sitting behind the man believed to have made racist comments. Newsflare/Iwirerick A passenger on a United Airlines flight from Chicago to Houston was removed from the plane after making offensive comments Passenger kicked off United Airlines plane in USA after 'racist comments' 
Footage shows the unidentified man arguing with offended passengers before he was booted off the plane at Chicago O'Hare International Airport along with his female companion. 
A female passenger behind the camera can be heard asking: "Who needs to get off the plane?" 
The man, who spoke with a strong Southern accent, replied: "All the illegals and s***." Newsflare/Iwirerick This unidentified man told fellow passengers filming he wanted 'all the illegals and s***' to get out Newsflare/Iwirerick A member of cabin crew ordered the man to collect his belongings and leave the plane Newsflare/Iwirerick Passengers can be heard jeering at the man as he's asked to get off the plane, yelling: 'Bye, racist!' Newsflare/Iwirerick The man and his female companion start swearing as they collect their belongings to leave the aircraft Newsflare/Iwirerick 6 The unruly man waves goodbye yelling: 'Goodbye, I’ll be back, you’ll be gone.' 
A flight attendant then appears and tells the man: "Sir, you’re going to have to collect your belongings and come with me." But the man protests and asks: "Where am I going to get my next flight?" The steward replies: "We’re going to talk about that outside." The woman behind the camera shouts: "White supremacist getting taken off the plane." 
Then fellow passengers can be heard yelling: "Racists aren't welcome in America. This is not Trump's America!" 
Others can be heard jeering at the man gets up from his seats, saying: "Bye, racist!" 
The man and his female companion start swearing as they collected their cabin luggage. 
As the unruly passenger leaves the plane, he waves goodbye and warns: "Hey, I'll come back, you'll be gone!" 
It is understood the flight continued to its destination to Houston, Texas, following his removal. 
United Airlines said it removed the passenger from the flight "for making comments that made other passengers uncomfortable". 
In a separate incident, a United Airlines pilot was removed from her airliner , which was preparing to take-off from an airport in Austin, Texas, after ranting on to stunned passengers about her divorce and President Donald Trump over the plane’s intercom.
